reviews.title: Perfect Office Desk Fan
reviews.review_text: It's the right size for my office desk at work. It doesn't take up much space. On the first speed it doesn't make a sound. The second speed, you can hear it just a little, white noise, but not enough for others to hear it around you. It's perfect. I highly recommend it as a buy.

reviews.title: Comfort Zone 6 inch desk fan
reviews.review_text: I bought this fan for my cubical desk area and it is absolutely perfect! The 6 inch size was needed for the space I wanted to cool. It has 2 speeds - high and low which both of them are extremely quiet so no one around me hears the fan on. It is adjustable moving it up and down as needed for the direction you want. It has a stand, not a clip fan, this is very sturdy and does not shake at all. I ordered it online through Walmart app and it arrived a few days later. Very satisfied with this fan! I recommend it!

reviews.title: My plants air
reviews.review_text: The size of the merchandise and the price and how much of it is on in use and does well for my plants

reviews.title: Small fan with great output
reviews.review_text: It does exactly what h needed it to do. So many fans are with USB now. I needed a regular fan for a small space with a plug! This puts out great air for it to be small.

A little noisy, must be sitting absolutely flat, vibration can cause it to drift a little so it to moves toward edge of counter causing vibration. Round base is a little larger and lighter than expected but then it's all plastic and the one I used to have had more metal. The weight makes a difference. These are hard to find in stores so if you want one that's electric, buy it.
The slow speed is a extra slow speed, so I'll just use the high speed. The main reason I bought this fan is because you can take it apart and CLEAN it.
This is a decent little fan. It is very quiet and moves the air well. Very easy to assemble.
doesn't put out much air at all. It's quiet which is a good thing but it needs to put out more air.

reviews.title: Close to worthless
reviews.review_text: Expensive for how tiny it is. Only has two speeds and neither move any air. Will be returning it for a refund.

reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
reviews.review_text: This fan stinks! The head has to be attached to the base and it constantly works loose. The base has no weight to it so it moves from the vibration, and even on high it doesn't blow much air.
Save your money. This fan was horrible. It barely blewxat all, much less on high.

reviews.title: As advertised
reviews.review_text: Purchased because my modem, router, etc. were putting out some heat and are installed in a small closet area. The heat caused malfunction in former modem and VOIP. The closet is adjacent to the living room, where television is located. The fan cannot be heard- which is why I selected this "quiet, portable" fan. Does the job!

reviews.title: Just Buy A Regular Size Fan For The Same Price
reviews.review_text: the adjustable tilt doesn't work well. I bought 2 of them in this size. 1 was for my son to have at his computer desk and the other was for my grandma to put on her bedside table to blow on her face while in bed. The adjustable base is very loose and wouldn't tighten enough to fully stand the fan upright. Don't waste your money!

reviews.title: DO NOT recommend, even for small spaces. waste of
reviews.review_text: This is the tiniest fan known to man. You cannot feel the airflow, and the fan does not adjust or change the tilt.
very small fan and only blows a little air which is what I needed. if you need a lot of air movement this is not your fan

reviews.title: Best little fan ever!
reviews.review_text: Best little fan ever, very quiet. I'm ordering two more!
perfect size perfect airflow perfect Price excellent delivery have a good day

reviews.title: Not as advertised
reviews.review_text: This is a white desk fan as the picture shows, not a vlip on black fan as the description says. Also, it wasn't very strong. I returned it.
The size is perfect , just what I needed. I like that I don't need to charge it. Excellent product. 😄
i plugged this in but it does not run. Returning it.

reviews.title: Nice little fan
reviews.review_text: This small fan has two speeds the low is really too low but the high speed gives a nice breeze. I wanted it for a small shelf in my daughters room. She has a loft bed and it is hard to get any air flow up there so this does the trick.

reviews.title: Good fan
reviews.review_text: Good little fan, perfect size for an end table or desk

reviews.title: it works for cubby at work
reviews.review_text: need fan for desk at work. this works perfect

reviews.title: didnt work
reviews.review_text: good size but did not blow out air very well at all especially on low setting. barely moved
the fan I ordered is a great size but the air flow from the fan is very weak, almost non existant

reviews.title: No clip with this fan, stand only.
reviews.review_text: This fan was supposed to have a clip. It did not, only had a stand.

reviews.title: Sucky fan
reviews.review_text: This fan is not even a table fan its as small as the handheld fans.

reviews.title: small but useful
reviews.review_text: I like to sleep with a fan on ! This fan has a gentle breeze and it suits my needs
My kitchen is really small and the exhaust isn't very good so I run this when I'm cooking and it's great

reviews.title: Good fan.
reviews.review_text: Very good little fan. We had one previously and it lasted several years. We use ours in the kitchen.

reviews.title: Prefect
reviews.review_text: Prefect size. Bought one before and it worked good. But I dropped it and broke the bottom of the stand. But the fan still worked.

reviews.title: Broken.
reviews.review_text: Did not work at all turned on for a moment then the motor just lightly buzzed, no movement, company that ships already giving me a problem. I want a refund!

Won't move a lot of air because, well, it's a small diameter fan. Moves enough for my use within a couple feet of cooled area. Quiet. Would prefer a rotary speed/off select than the slide switch. Like it can be pointed downward since it sits on an above shelf to blow downward. Does not oscillate, but I already knew that, and don't need it for where it is used. Would like the fan blade cage to be easier to separate for dusting (have to use a flat-blade screwdriver to pry the halves apart to get inside to dust the blades). I had one before, and this was a replacement. After near 4 years, the old one's motor bearing were getting noisy. Note: The fan blades are simply pressed onto the motor spindle, so friction holds the blades to the spindle. When pointed straight down, the blades will gradually slide off the spindle which will have the blades bang against the cage. Used hot-melt glue to affix blades to spindle.

reviews.title: Nicely workable
reviews.review_text: Extremely quiet !! Doesn't move much air , but I only needed it to keep the back of a large screen T V stay cool .

reviews.title: kind of weak
reviews.review_text: Not as powerful as thought. very weak. will have to return it. but wall Mart is still the best place to shop.
Fan does not rotate but works well. It vibrates and slides when on flat surface, but a folded up piece of cloth stopped it from moving.

reviews.title: Comfort Zone Fan
reviews.review_text: Perfect for my small bathroom it sits on my sink while I'm getting ready...to be small it gives off a lot of air and it's 2 speeds

reviews.title: Short Life, Not worth the Purchase.
reviews.review_text: Purchased in April 2021, Died September 2021. Good quality while lasted but now need to resort to fnding an alternative.

reviews.title: Great little fan but watch price!
reviews.review_text: I just bought this and paid $7.63, loved it and went to order another and the price is now $15.74! Why?! It a great little fan but I am not going to now pay essentially double, what is going on?

reviews.review_text: this was a out of season artilcal and found just what I wanted at wallmart.com. I sent for it and got it in the mail in just a couple days.this was great. D@D

reviews.title: Good Fan for the Money
reviews.review_text: This is the same model I purchased about 7 years ago to use in my bathroom. The fan still worked, but I had dropped it and the base cracked and fell apart. So I was happy to see the model was still available. Does the job.

reviews.title: broken

Poorly made fan. The fan will not stay together, bolts for fan not operable
Not what i thought i was getting. These are too small!
Very nice, looks good and works great. Fills my need
It's kinda smaller then I thought it would be, I don't like that the bolt is hard to get tight. But overall it's okay.

reviews.title: It works as it should
reviews.review_text: The fan is small but does what it needs to do. It works well despite the package being questionable.

reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
reviews.review_text: Can not tighten the side bolt to get the fan to stay up. Faces down which defeats the purpose of getting this as a desk fan.

reviews.title: Week and expensive
reviews.review_text: Not a strong blowing fan, too expensive for it's size and the fact it's not strong. You can buy a normal size fan for this price.

reviews.title: an is much too small for the price.
reviews.review_text: I was disappointed in the size. This fan belongs on a night table or desk. Will not buy another one. Price was too high.

reviews.title: 6 inch- 2 speed desk fan.
reviews.review_text: I am ready disappointment in this fan. After having it for two months the bearings are making a noise.Not worth the money that I paid for it. Could have gotten a better one at Dollar General store .Cheaper and would have lasted me for a long time.
worked good for about 45 days then started making horrible noises had to send back to mfg

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.review_text: I Like the fan but was a little to small. Took it back for a bigger one.

reviews.title: Not powerful, but effective.
reviews.review_text: Great little fan, but not super powerful.
The circular outside plastic frame is broken. I will return it and try again.

reviews.title: Worth the money!
reviews.review_text: Very lite fan but good output. Pets Note: pets will tip it over easily.

reviews.title: Good Buy.
reviews.review_text: The is a great little local area fan. It is whisper quite. Nice price at Walmart.
Small and puts out plenty of air for what I use it for (in my kitchen)

reviews.title: Love my fan
reviews.review_text: I use my fan when Im on the couch just to have some. air flow on me it works very well

reviews.title: Good Air Movement
reviews.review_text: Perfect size, and great air movement to cool down at work.

reviews.review_text: Got exactly what I wanted. Works great.

reviews.review_text: Just right for my office desk

reviews.title: Quiet fan
reviews.review_text: Great little fan for the price. Amazing how quiet it is!

reviews.title: Good little fan
reviews.review_text: Moves quite a bit of air for it's size

reviews.title: n/a
reviews.review_text: size of fan fit perfect, but it was way under power, I jury rigged an old microwave fan instead

reviews.title: Great buy
reviews.review_text: Item exactly as expected. Works great and quiet.

reviews.title: Some versions make a whistling noise when running
reviews.review_text: I bought 2 of these and found that there are two versions with slight differences. One has a round tightening knob for the angle of tilt and the base is designed to sit angled downward a little in front. This kind makes a whistling noise when running which is annoying. The other has a "T" shaped angle adjustment knob and the bottom of the base is made to sit flat. This type makes a normal humming noise running. I tried returning the whistling one hoping to get another of the type that is better and just hums when running. Unfortunately, I got another whistling type as a replacement.
Cheap. Always getting dirt inside of it on the blades.

reviews.title: Very happy
reviews.review_text: I like it because it's small for my nightstand and also because it's very quiet so it doesn't annoy my husband. It does tilt up and down but it does not swivel. Very happy with it that I ordered a 2nd one for my makeup table.

reviews.title: Good little fan
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I got this for my husband because he really likes having a fan blowing in his face at night when he sleeps and I really don't. But he says this fan has just enough airflow to make him feel comfortable on the nightstand next to his face and I feel like it's just enough airflow that it's not too hard and blowing around him and hitting me in the face. It's not a super strong breeze that blows out but it's just enough for us. It's really quiet and I like that about it too. I like that it's not battery operated so I don't have to change or charge anything to get it to work. My kids keep grabbing and it playing with it and they haven't broken it yet so that's also a good sign. I knocked off 1 star because I think most people would like it to have a better airflow than it does.

reviews.title: Great Little Fan
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I received this little desk fan and let me just say it packs a big punch. Puts out lots of air for its size. It is extremely quiet and doesn't bother my co-workers. I would highly recommend this fan to anyone!

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is fantastic desk fan...like it says it's quiet that is perfect...I don't like noisy fans..Love it that it's portable because I also use it for my kitchen and for things that needs to cool down fast

reviews.title: Wasn't to happy with it
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Overall it wasn't to bad but it didn't really even do much at all even for a personal desk fan . I don't know if it was just the fan I got but it didn't blow out the right way it was blowing out the opposite way witch is kind of disappointing but for the price I can't really complain I guess .

reviews.title: Loving my Comfort Zone Fan!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] My Comfort Zone 6 inch Quiet Portable Indoor 2 Speed Desk Fan was easy to setup and is a great accessory in my home office space. It is both quiet and light and adds the comfort that my office needs for purpose of adequate home ventilation. The heat emitted from my computer can be bothersome but my fan has the capability of providing a nice work atmosphere when most needed. This is by far a unique cute alternative to having a large fan and fits perfectly in my office home area. It is sturdy and stable plus effective in providing the air needed for the amount of space.

reviews.title: Small but Mighty
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I got this fan for my office that gets direct sunlight and is always so hot. The fan is so little it was so easy to find a spot on my desk to place it. It has an adjustable head so you can have it pointing wherever you want. I prefer the softer speed however it has hurricane force winds setting as well.

reviews.title: Perfect for small room
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Was easy to put together. And it was a really good size. Did not take up a lot of room. Has low and high speed. Is adjustable. For its little size it really packs a punch. You can feel it from across the room. Great to sit on a small desk beside the bed.

reviews.title: good fan
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is an alright fan. it's on the small side so good for small spaces, and to sit on a desk. And it is semi powerful for the small size. But i have an issue with that although it's small it's larger than small desk fans and you should be able to take it apart to be able to clean it and it should turn side to side ( because it is on the larger size or small) and it says it's supposed to be quiet but it doesn't seem anymore quiet than a normal fan. Just a basic desk fan.

reviews.title: Perfect Personal Fan
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Small and moves alot of air. Plan to get another one for our RV! Currently use on my desk in the office. Not terribly loud, even in close quarters. Seems to move alot of air even on lower settings. Would recommend.

reviews.title: Perfect for my desk!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This little cutie is just the perfect thing for my desk. It provides plenty of air movement and is super quiet. It's made well and should last beyond what most portable fans do. I love that it is white with white blades. Doesn't look industrial at all.

reviews.title: Keeps me cool while I'm working
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This 6-inch portable fan is perfect for keeping the air flowing when I'm working at my desk that is in a corner of our living area where the air flow from the ceiling fan doesn't quite reach. The fan comes in two pieces but is very easy to assemble with just one screw. The fan is adjustable to put the air flow exactly where it is needed. It has 2 speeds but the low speed is perfect for what I need & it provides comfort without blowing everything off of the desk. It is quiet & doesn't vibrate on the desktop plus it is not top-heavy so I don't worry about it tipping over. I am very happy with this desk fan & it is exactly what I needed to stay comfortable while working.

reviews.title: Super Cool
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I got this a couple of weeks ago and and I love how it's the prefect size for a desk and I love how it has a sweeping Motion and the fact that it has two different speeds. I also like the the fact that you can tilt to the Angle you need.

reviews.title: Small but mighty
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Comfort Zone CZ6D 6-inch Quiet Portable Indoor 2-Speed Desk Fan is perfect for my desk. It is quiet but provides just the right amount of cool air to keep me comfortable. This will be very important for those hot summer days.

reviews.title: It's “fan tastic”
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] We love this fan. It is the perfect size for our RV. It is so quiet you can't hear it run. It has 2 speeds. I wish it had the oscillating feature. For a six inch fan it really put out a good breeze on either speed.

reviews.title: Great little fan
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Love this little fan. I use it in my bedroom for those nights when it's not really hot. It sits on top of my dresser little away from me. And I have it set on lowest speed and I can feel it just fine. I would differently recommend this fan.

reviews.title: Cool Breeze!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love this Comfort Zone- 6 inch portable indoor fan. The two speeds make it comfortable to adjust the temperature in the room. I use it at my desk in my classroom. The stable base with adjustable tilt makes it easy to focus the cool air where I need it most.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I use this little fan in my arts and craft room to dry my paintings and it is PERFECT! It is just the right size for my art table and doesn't take up much space. It is quiet and blows perfect for what I'm using it for.

reviews.title: Small but powerfull
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The breeze that emits out of this fan is very impressive.The fan stood up on its own.Assembly was pretty easy and there are pictures with the instructions, the only con I had was that the base of this fan is very sharp, so you have to be careful not to cut your self on it.everything else was good.This would probably be big enough for one small room.

reviews.title: Use it constantly!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I received this item in exchange for my honest review. Suprised at home much we use this little fan! It's great to have in the hallway closet to grab as needed. Our daughter loves using it for playing with scarbves! LEt them fly in the air.

reviews.title: Quiet and effective!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The fan was very easy to assemble. It takes up very little space on my desk. I like that is has two modes (low and high) because I get cold easily. It's VERY quiet. The low mode is almost silent which is really nice. Really excellent airflow, more than expected for the size. The low mode is perfect for my needs. The fan is lightweight but sturdy. The cord is standard length but I kinda wish the cord were a little longer. Really the cord length is the only suggestion I have. It's a great little fan!

reviews.title: Works like a charm!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I started using this fan about a week ago and I have to say that it works like a charm. I am a teacher, so a small desk fan comes in very handy. The amount of air output is surprising for such a small, portable fan but what I like even more than that is how quietly it operates. It is perfect on my nightstand for sleeping also! I highly recommend this product.

reviews.title: Perfect fan for a tiny space!
reviews.review_text: I love this fan! It's so quiet. I use it in my tiny music studio so I can have air moving and still hear my students clearly. I still have one I bought several years ago. If you need a fan for a small space, this should make you happy.

reviews.title: Not pleased
reviews.review_text: The fan arrived broke and did not work. The whole base was cracked. I am handicapped and was not able to take back. I ordered a different fan which has finally arrived and works.

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.review_text: This small fan is excellent for my kitchen

reviews.title: Not very powerful but great for a small area
reviews.review_text: Tiny, not very strong but effective for the area I purchased it for so overall not a bad buy.
Perfect fan for at my desk. Quite and perfect flow for high and low
